dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S1339 IS: To permanently authorize the special immigrant nonminister religious worker program.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Hatch (for himself and Mr. Cardin) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To permanently authorize the special immigrant nonminister religious worker program.

section.header: Special immigrant nonminister religious worker program
section.text: Section 101(a)(27)(C)(ii) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1101(a)(27)(C)(ii)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subclause (I), by striking the comma at the end and inserting a semicolon;
by striking before September 30, 2015, each place such phrase appears; and
in subclause (II), by striking , or and inserting ; or.
